description: The map forms part of Ghana National Petroleum Corporation (GNPC) exploration and production activities. A number of oil, oil/gas and gas fields have been found in especially the Tano basin. In all eighty-nine (89) wells have been drilled in the country. Six (6) discoveries have been made. 75% of 50 exploratory wells drilled encountered varying degrees of hydrocarbons."
name: GNPC Activity Map of Ghana's Offshore Oil Fields
